description: {"blocks":[{"key":"as2te","text":"Genomic DNA was extracted from the liver of an adult female Limnodynastes dumerilii dumerilii  using the Gentra Puregene Tissue Kit (QIAGEN, Hilden, Germany) with modifications as outlined in this protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":60,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":14},{"key":1,"offset":74,"length":10}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"FF1D37EC3E8F4FAE9159D71BF0752B8F","url":null}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"4E4E1171AC694AC2AE782393DDE8CE98","url":null}}}}
keywords: DNA extraction,DNA purification,Gentra Puregene Tissue Kit,the eastern banjo frog
manuscript_citation: Li Q, Guo Q, Zhou Y, et al. Protocols for "DNA extraction protocol for the eastern banjo frog using the Gentra Puregene Tissue Kit.". 2020, protocols.io. dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.bcy6ixze.

parent_collections.title: Protocols for the draft genome assembly of the eastern banjo frog Limnodynastes dumerilii dumerilii

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"empe","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"6nlvs","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"8rasn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"49B0F350589B11EA80F565A95925D5E9","height":110,"id":345060,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"934b3","text":"Add 300 µl Protein Precipitation Solution and vortex vigorously for 20s at high speed.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fp9ef","text":"\n","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9pt1f","text":"Centrifuge for 5min at 16000 x g.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":[]},"mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Protein precipitation.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/public/c85e16467e6b1924bd0d599a5ff7753dcb1290d2e688d6ee0384c9afc90768b9/bzjibbsr7.png","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/ks9ebbsr7.jpg","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/ks9dbbsr7.webp","width":300}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":20,"guid":"95A0B31059DE11EAB0618F2D764F79A5","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"9AFC01C059DE11EAB0618F2D764F79A5","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"alc3m","text":"The following protocol is a modification of the protocol for \"DNA purification from 5-10mg fresh or frozen solid tissue\" using the Gentra Puregene Genomic DNA Purification Kit. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8glv9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4rmv7","text":"The amounts listed in this protocol are for a single extraction. Four replicate extractions were made using this protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3qrp9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1ikd7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"33vfp","text":"Approximately 30mg of frozen liver tissue was minced with a scapel blade on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

Add 6 µl  of Proteinase K Solution (20mg/ml) and mix by inverting 25 times. Incubate at 55 °C overnight with agitation.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1c169","text":"\n","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dree5","text":"Heat RNase A Solution (12mg/ml) to 100 °C for 10 min.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1il2n","text":"Add 1.5 µl to the microfuge tube, mix by inverting 25 times and incubate at 37 °C for 60 min.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ckc9i","text":"\n","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8dg53","text":"Cool to room
